projects.title: Revenue KPI Dashboard
projects.description: An executive dashboard that provides a comprehensive view of revenue metrics and KPIs, allowing business leaders to monitor performance, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions.

details.challenge: The executive team lacked a unified view of revenue metrics across different business units, making it difficult to identify trends and make timely decisions.
details.solution: Developed a comprehensive dashboard that aggregates data from multiple sources, providing real-time insights into revenue performance, growth trends, and key performance indicators.
details.impact: Reduced reporting time by 80%, improved decision-making speed by 60%, and identified $2M in revenue optimization opportunities within the first quarter.

projects.title: Customer Churn & Retention Analytics
projects.description: A sophisticated analytics platform that helps businesses understand and reduce customer churn while improving retention rates through predictive modeling and actionable insights.

details.challenge: High customer churn rate of 15% monthly with no clear understanding of contributing factors or early warning indicators.
details.solution: Built a predictive analytics platform using machine learning to identify at-risk customers and provide actionable retention strategies based on behavioral patterns.
details.impact: Reduced monthly churn from 15% to 11%, increased customer lifetime value by 40%, and saved $3.5M annually in customer acquisition costs.

projects.title: Sales Pipeline Funnel Analytics
projects.description: A comprehensive sales pipeline visualization tool that tracks conversion rates across different stages of the sales process, helping sales teams identify bottlenecks and optimize their approach.

details.challenge: Sales team struggled with visibility into pipeline health, leading to inaccurate forecasting and missed opportunities at various stages of the sales process.
details.solution: Created an interactive funnel visualization that tracks deals through each stage, identifies bottlenecks, and provides actionable insights for sales optimization.
details.impact: Improved win rate from 18% to 24%, reduced average sales cycle by 20%, and increased quarterly revenue by $5M through better pipeline management.

projects.title: Lead Source Attribution Dashboard
projects.description: An interactive dashboard for tracking and analyzing lead sources to optimize marketing spend and improve ROI. Visualizes lead attribution data with interactive charts.

details.challenge: Marketing team was spending $500K monthly across channels with no clear understanding of which sources generated quality leads and revenue.
details.solution: Implemented multi-touch attribution tracking and visualization to show the true ROI of each marketing channel and campaign throughout the customer journey.
details.impact: Reduced marketing spend by 30% while increasing qualified leads by 45%, resulting in $2M additional revenue and 150% improvement in marketing ROI.
